entry.title: Thoughts after reading about Jan D. Achenbach
entry.content: Reading Material_1Reading Material_2 Jan D. Achenbach, known for his contributions on the solid mechanics, is a member of US National Academy of Sciences and National Academy of Engineering and was honored the Timoshenko Medal, which is the highest award in mechanics community. He has published more than 300 research papers and developed methods for flaw detection and characterization by using contact transducers, imaging techniques, and laser-based ultrasonics. He has been extensively cooperating with investigators from other universities and from industrial organizations on both theoretical and experimental projects.Absolutely, he is a great scientist. What impressed me a lot is that he has cultivated so many distinguished scientists such as L. B. Freund, who is also a Timoshenko Medalist. As far as I know, he also directly or indirectly guided a number of outstanding mechanicians born in China, e. g. Yonggang Huang, Zhigang Suo and Huajian Gao, though I’m not quite sure about this. Indeed, he helped a lot on the higher education and research of China and also contributed a lot in advocating the academic communications of the whole world. I think that he is more of an educationist than just a scientist.

entry.title: 网站设置基本完成
entry.content: 10月初捣鼓了一两天，有事耽搁就扔在那了，这两天好好看了看hexo和主题的官方文档，稍微顺利一些（网上博客的一些总结很好，但是很多过了时效。）。先配置Hexo的环境，然后同时po到github和codingme，分国内外dns，加载速度要好一些，算是个一劳永逸的活吧。再就是配置next主题的各项配置了，官方文档需要更新了。。。分享页面那里折腾了很久，因为以前的分享方法基本不管用了，最后用的sharesdk。博客的网页是搭好了，真正关键的是内容，希望自己平时能更一些对自己有益对大家有益的东西吧。
